A group rape-injury case occurred by two US Navy soldiers in Okinawa. In response to the girl violent case that occurred in 1995, the US ambassador to Japan at the time Mondale represented "Three Animals" and committed the crime as a "detestable incident by three people like abominable, ridiculous, beagle" Although I criticized and apologized, the anger of the prefectural people did not fit. (to be continued)

(Cont.) On the contrary, it evolved into a big problem that shook the base of the Okinawa base problem and the Japan-US security arrangements. It is no longer an issue to apologize that such incident repeatedly happens again. About Okinawa Prefecture's overburdened burden and risk elimination It is time for all citizens to think seriously, as well as Japanese and US government officials and politicians.
